title: Lincoln's WARNING #100028: Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up #Shorts
script: Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up?! Man, fuck all that! They lying to your FACE and you just accepting it! These old ass politicians ain't NEVER struggled a day! Never missed a meal! Never chose between rent and food! But THEY know what's best for YOU?! Bullshit! Bitcoin QR!
